ComicInfo.Summary: Darkness Visible: Our heroes take on the Mys-Tech Psycho Warriors and many on both sides are slain in the battle. A core group of heroes make it to the Mys-Tech council and Wolverine kills two of them which Dark Angel fears will bring about the end of the world.
